title: AVENGERS BY BRIAN MICHAEL BENDIS VOL. 5 TPB (Trade Paperback)
description: Mission to the Microverse! Iron Man, Captain America, Thor and Giant-Man embark on a dangerous trip to the subatomic world of the Microverse — home to strange alien races, a power-sapping atmosphere and a centaur warlord who wants them dead! It’s also the location of an emergency beacon signaling an Avenger in trouble. What — or better yet, who — they find there will change the Avengers forever…if they survive! Plus: Simon Williams has a problem. As the legendary Avenger Wonder Man, he fought countless battles as one of Earth’s Mightiest Heroes. Now, he wants the Avengers to disband — or else. What are his motives? And what happens when the Avengers say no? Collecting AVENGERS #31-34, NEW AVENGERS ANNUAL #1 AVENGERS ANNUAL #1.
